content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(52.5, 51.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position 52.5, 51.5)
- Electric poles (attempted placements at positions 51.5, 52.5, and 53.5)

### Electric pole network
Consists of the following entities:
- Existing electric pole (position 24.25, 30.0)

### Copper plate mine at position(1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 1.0, 1.0) and a furnace (position 1.0, 1.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure there are no existing objects in the way before attempting to place electric poles. Check the surrounding area for obstructions.

### Errors when inserting coal into steam engine
- Verify that the steam engine is connected to the power network before attempting to insert coal.
- Ensure the steam engine has available space to accept coal before inserting.

### Errors when trying to connect to steam engine
- Make sure to move closer to the steam engine if you receive distance-related errors when attempting to connect electric poles.

### Inventory management errors
- Keep track of your inventory to ensure you have the necessary items, such as small electric poles, before attempting to place them.
